evidence: We developed a name-aware MT framework which tightly integrates name tagging and name translation into training and decoding of MT. Experiments on Chinese-English translation demonstrated the effectiveness of our approach over a high-quality MT baseline in both overall translation and name translation , especially for formal genres .
